website_summaries.verdict: Zippy, classic go kart with signature red and white Radio Flyer design. High-quality frame.
pros: Safe for kids ages three to eight, and even comes with parent-controlled speed lock and seat belt
Traction on front tires improves grip and provides a better ride
Seat is adjustable to grow with the young rider
cons: Requires assembly, and weight limit is 81 pounds
May need to replace tires after some use

customer_reviews.title: Big Fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this go kart. He’s 4 and handles it like a pro. Even though it has 3 speeds he only uses the fastest one because he likes to drift. Perfect for the adventurous kid
customer_reviews.author: SirLac

customer_reviews.title: this.is.amazing.
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my 5yo son for christmas. At first he didnt like it because the beginning speed was too slow, so I unlocked speed level two and its the right balance of safety and terrifying the #$%& out of me. Level 3 speed maybe when he hit 6 or 7. My only complaint is the tires, they are just like the big wheel plastic tires I grew up with so I am wary of when/how/price to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hallberg

customer_reviews.title: A child’s dream car
customer_reviews.text: What I can I say it’s a radio flyer, didn’t expect much out of this since I’ve never heard of it, but let me tell you, this cart is amazing, my daughter loves it. Easy to assemble, very durable parts, cool looking and my daughter loves it. She is five and I can’t get her off it. I love the fact you have three speed modes and are able to screw a clip to keep your child from putting it in level 3, which is max power. It’s top speed is 8 mph, but my five year old handles it pretty well. This cart is highly recommended as it assists with awareness and reaction time. Awesome cart.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Flawed charger
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year olds birthday, needless so say he loved it. Unfortunately, the charger lasted 3 days then stopped working. I contacted radio flyer but I took them 5 days to respond and asks more questions then takes another 5 days to respond. It has been a month that this go cart is not working and I still haven’t received my charger yet. I tried ordering a charger from a different company but it did not fit. I am returning since it’s still in the window to return.
customer_reviews.author: Yip

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last but three months
customer_reviews.text: It only ran for three months and stopped working! I paid $299.99 for this and now it’s worthless because my son can’t use it because it won’t work!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Charles

customer_reviews.title: Lots a fun for 5 days
customer_reviews.text: After a week of use the Go Kart is unusable. It was so much fun for 5 days until the rear tires completely fall apart. Now I’m here with two sad kids. Camon Radio Flyer we where expecting much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: sbs30

customer_reviews.title: Great go cart, but thin plastic rear wheels
customer_reviews.text: Rear wheel got a dent in it and cracked within 1 week of getting the product and riding it by a 4 year old. Going to call Radio Flyer customer service to see if they can replace the wheel. Otherwise, it's a fun and great go cart! Update: Rear wheels crack easily, have had to replace 2 already and haven't owned the go kart for a month yet. Radio Flyer has been great sending replacement wheels free of charge so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. 9, 5 and 4 year olds enjoy and can maneuver easily - took a few hours for the youngest to get the hang of reverse and forward speeds. All enjoy speed 3 the most - looks faster than expected, we are pleased with the the speed. Only concern is the rear wheels are considerably worn after three weeks of moderate use over driveway and grass. Delivery of 1 of 2 was terrible, damaged parts and packaging - the only issue so far.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: This is is one of the fastest (from manufacture) battery powered red alongs
customer_reviews.text: My son as gone through 6v, 12v, 24 v and modified 24v powerwheels as well as a 24v crazykart. This thing power slides and is really awesome. easy to build, and the seat is adjustable in 3 positions !
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Comes with three forward speeds. At speed 1, it goes as fast as my neighbor kid's 12v ride on car. At speed 3, it drifts really well. Motor seems to be very powerful. Even I tried it myself and it drifted a slightly despite me weighing 150 lbs. One thing I wish is that they should have given at aleast another 6 to 8 inches of legroom. My son who is 6 is folding his leg quite a bit to fit it between the seat and the pedal. Also, at speed 3, the plastic tires are very loud. Hopefully your neighbors are friendly. :)
customer_reviews.author: phiren

customer_reviews.title: Super cool go cart!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! My son loves this thing. Super quick. Burns out. Skids. And easy to drive. Only complaint is that is dies after only about 1 hr or 1hr and a half when you have it on the fasted speed which is 3. If you have it on 2 or 1 definitely saves the battery. But if your son's like mine he will kill the battery quick. Kind of loud but it's really cool. Easy to charge and assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This little go kart is fantastic. My 5 yo loves it. It has good speed range. The high speed is adequately fast. We have been having in for about two weeks now. The battery is holding very well. My son plays about 30min to 1hour each time (lots of drifting) and seems like we need to charge after 3-4 days. Given the drifting I feel soon we might need new wheels. :-) I hope the battery and the motor hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Esi K

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: This was one of our better gifts for our children. We have had it for about a month and our boys love it. Purchased more for our 5 yr old but even our 8 yr old loves it. It's just fast enough to be fun but thankfully not reckless! It really is more for spinning in circles (doughnuts, cookies, etc). Assembly was quite simple. Battery is surprisingly long lasting. The only downside to the make is I can see the tires wearing out due to the spinning. They should get plenty of fun before that happens however!
customer_reviews.author: ckm

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery won’t hold charge after only a months worth of use. Always took care of battery. Charged after every use
customer_reviews.author: Holly k.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Look kinda cheesy in the advertising but they are amazing my kids ride them everyday. My 7 year actually enjoys it more than my 5 year old
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Plowright

customer_reviews.title: Super Fast for a 4 year old and great fun.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son has loved it. We started with the 5mph setting and within a week we moved it up to the 8mph setting where he can drift and have lots of fun. Just make sure that your child will focus and handle the go kart properly. It can easily be a bit too much for a child at 8mph. I would buy it over and over. Get one and watch how much fun your child will have. I have been running a mile around the neighborhood with him riding next to me at 8mph. We have only had it for less than two months. So, I can’t speak towards how long the wheels will last.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Sales de Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Thin Weak Tires
customer_reviews.text: Overall this race car was SO much fun for my newly 5 year old. It was quick and easy to assemble and really goes pretty quick. We were in love for the first 3 weeks. Then the tires quickly shredded and had gashes through the sides of the back tires. He hadn't even driven it that much. We are very disappointed to say the least. I'd say if you do get this, drive it ONLY on grass not on the street.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Antis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: First day riding this go kart and its definitely an awesome toy! It defiently makes us parents want to buy an adult sized go kart. So far the quality seems to be good, the only thing I can see replacing eventually are the rear tires.
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The car worked great for a month. Then it stopped charging. Bought a protection plan and all it did was refer me to radio flyer which is non responsive.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sick! Lasts a long time on 2nd gear but 3rd gear seems to run the battery down really fast but overall my 3 & 6 yr olds love it. Doesn't really drift unless they're in 3rd so if they're really little stay to 2nd gear.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Heany

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this go cart! It’s goes “fast” and he enjoys driving it! It is able to go through our grass which is a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Hazelton

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than a week !
customer_reviews.text: The kids rode it a couple times and it started smoking (electrical fire) . It will still charge but electric motors are bad. We haven’t even had it a week. I thought Radio Flyer were good products.
customer_reviews.author: LIDIYA A TARANOVA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Item worked for three days then stopped working in forward and only reverse works. Purchased two. The first unit stopped charging after only 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: john scillieri

customer_reviews.title: Does work for 3 yr. olds!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3 yr. old Grandson for Christmas and he loves it. We did not know how well it would go in the grass and it does just fine .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ride!
customer_reviews.text: My son is seven years old. He loves his new ride. The wheels could of been better. It is a solid frame, so instead of plastic maybe actual tires would've been excellent. The assembly was a challenge. We almost gave up! At the end it was worth it. My boy is happy!
customer_reviews.author: erika irizarry

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I apparently had no idea what I was buying, thinking this was a easy going little toddlers car. My four year old convinced me to remove the safety for gear 3 and took off! This thing is awesome if used safely! It even drifts in 3rd gear! This was a great starter go kart for my 4 y/o.
customer_reviews.author: Baseball Pops

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: My son didn’t even get a chance to ride it the battery never charged. I was so upset .
customer_reviews.author: elaine fleming

customer_reviews.title: check all the parts before assembly
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this car for my 5 years old daugher, after my husband assembly half way, and we find out missing parts, kind of sad and the front head of the car, its crack, we guess when on the way ship to our home. my kid like the car, but me and my husband really unset missing part and crack.
customer_reviews.author: MK kwan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunate purchase. Just using it now after receiving for Christmas. Charge lasts for approximately 2 seconds - bottom line, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had one growing up.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter absolutely loves this car. The drifting ability is really neat. 8mph is a lot faster that you think.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Right rear wheel stopped working after two weeks. Disappointed in product quality.
customer_reviews.author: eram13

customer_reviews.title: Found the hardware.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I didn't receive the hardware to put this together but on third glance, there it was in a bag I hadn't yet opened! Husband put it together in half an hour. Soon to give it to the birthday boy and assume it'll be a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Island Gal

customer_reviews.title: Battery no longer holding a charge
customer_reviews.text: No longer holding a charge after a few months. Save your money and don’t buy this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Beto

customer_reviews.title: Even a 10 yr old can ride
customer_reviews.text: Buy this thing, don't hesitate, don't think about it, buy ....this.....thing you won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun car
customer_reviews.text: It’s so much fun. My kids and neighbors enjoy hours of racing with this one. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: GEISA

customer_reviews.title: Fits in the trunk.
customer_reviews.text: In case anyone is wondering if it fits inside the trunk of their car. That’s a 2016 Honda Civic Sadan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now this is a GO-CART
customer_reviews.text: Built well, not to much of a hassle to assemble and an outstanding product compared to others in the same pricing category. Its was well worth the money to have something the kids can use and enjoy without constant issues!
customer_reviews.author: Murray Steeg

customer_reviews.title: Stay away...garbage
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage. Spent an hours assembling it and after charging it for 18 hours, it didn't work, now we have take everything apart to return, absolute waste of time, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Eli loves his fast go cart!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson Eli who is 4 years old loves his fast go cart!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Hazlett

customer_reviews.title: Envy of the neighborhood
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect but could use just an inch more ground clearance and also I wish the seat adjustment was easier
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Stable
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren 6 & 5 absolutely love these go-carts. The 3 speeds are exciting to them. They are quite sturdy, reliable, and the 8mph speed is fast enough for them to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complains! :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two months ago, and my 7-year-old stepdaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Works like advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves it, works as advertised. Faster than we thought, drives it like in the video.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great experience!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice for go cart. Loads of fun. Well built sturdy assembly. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome go cart. Can take punishment and even drive fast in the wet grass. Perfect for my five year old.
customer_reviews.author: jeff backus

product_meta.title: Radio Flyer Ultimate Go-Kart, 24 Volt Outdoor Ride On Toy, Ages 3-8
product_meta.description: Bring home the fun and inspire hours of outdoor play with radio flyer's ultimate go-kart! It features three forward speed settings (2. 5, 5 and 8mph) and automatic braking. The sturdy steel frame and adjustable seat let the fun continue from ages 3-8! Kids will stay safe with the parent-controlled speed lock, seat belt and high-visibility racing Flag. Maneuver corners with ease thanks to rubber traction on the front tires. The large rear wheels are perfect for drifting! 24V battery and charger included. Maximum weight capacity 81 lbs.
feature_bullets: HIGH-SPEED FUN: The Ultimate Go-Kart offers three forward-driving speed settings: 2.5, 5 and 8 MPH and single speed reverse (2.5 MPH). 24 volt battery and charger included.
DRIFTING REAR TIRES: The combination of rubber traction on the front tires and the extra wide rear wheel slicks make this the ultimate drifting vehicle.
AWARD WINNING GO-KART: The Ultimate Go-Kart has been named a 2020 Parents’ Choice Recommended Award.
SAFETY FEATURES: The parent-controlled speed lock allows parents to control the driving speed. It also features a seat belt and a racing flag for increased visibility.
ADJUSTABLE SEAT: The adjustable seat allows this go-kart to grow with your child from ages 3 to 8 years.
SPECIFICATIONS: Assembled product dimensions: 43” L x 30.25” W x 37.2” H. Maximum weight capacity 81 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars151 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
